name: NSNotification
desc: An object containing information broadcast to registered observers that bridges to Notification; use NSNotification when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Initializes a notification with the data from an unarchiver.

items.name: init(name: NSNotification.Name, object: Any?)
items.desc: Returns a new notification object with a specified name and object.

items.name: init(name: NSNotification.Name, object: Any?, userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?)
items.desc: Initializes a notification with a specified name, object, and user information.

items.name: struct NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A structure that defines the name of a notification.

items.name: var object: Any?
items.desc: The object associated with the notification.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: The user information dictionary associated with the notification.
